name: BKD Technologies
tagline: Help you grow and make important decisions.
description:
BKD Technologies is a member of the Microsoft Inner Circle, representing the top one percent of business partners worldwide, a member of the Microsoft Presidents circle and a Microsoft Gold ERP and Silver CRM Partner. In addition, BKD Technologies is a member of Sage Software's Presidents Circle and a Sage Authorized Partner.
We can help you maintain or establish a competitive edge with the help of credentialed and experienced technology professionals.
